description.zh: 机器学习论文、代码、数据集和基准的综合平台，追踪各任务的 SOTA 模型和结果
description.en: Comprehensive platform for ML papers, code, datasets and benchmarks, tracking SOTA models and results across tasks

authority_justification.zh: 被 Meta AI 收购，是 AI 研究社区追踪最新进展的标准参考
authority_justification.en: Acquired by Meta AI, the standard reference for tracking ML research progress in the AI community
